page.title: 18SATURDAY IN NEWTON MEARNS
page.content: Each Saturday morning people tend to get up from their beds at a later time because they have no work or school to attend. Children get up earlier than adults and watch television while the adults lie in bed. By late morning, after they have eaten, the adults go to their various activities. These include gardening, occasional shopping, going driving or playing sports. Children play with their friends, do sport, or go to watch professional football matches. At night many people go into the busy town for a meal in a restaurant or stay in with the children and then watch television or a video recording. Younger adults go out for a drink or to the cinema and all retire to bed at a later time than usual.
